title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Monday, 1 February 2016 - BBC News
summary: a man has been arrested in northampton on sus of murder following the discovery of a woman 's body in the town .
millions of pounds of public money loaned to northampton town football club for the redevelopment of sixfields was `` misappropriated '' by developers according to claims made in legal documents .
a police officer from northampton has been jailed for life after being found guilty of murdering his wife .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: local live is finished for today but we 'll be back tomorrow at 08:00 with the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire .

documents.title: more tributes to india chipchase
text: more customers at the collingtree have been giving their tributes to india chipchase , thought to have been murdered in the town .
the 20-year-old worked at the northampton pub , where she was described as an `` angel '' .

documents.title: legion d'honneur recipient says he does n't know whether he 's 'worthy ' of honour
text: tony haywood , from oundle , is remaining modest about his role in world war two , despite being awarded the legion d'honneur by the french president .
the 90-year-old former hardware store owner took part in the final push against the germans following the d-day landings in 1945 .
he says he was n't `` especially brave ''
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: adrian goldsmith sentencing : judge says police officer tried to 'avoid the consequences ' of his actions
text: in court today , northampton police officer adrian goldsmith was told by judge paul gleen that `` what was abundantly plain during the course of your trial was that you set about establishing a defence in an attempt to avoid the consequences of your actions . ''
he added : `` you lied repeatedly to the police , to the doctors who were treating you and to the prison chaplain some weeks later when you were on remand .
`` you had caused injuries to yourself to enable the defence you ran at your trial to get off the ground . ''
he will serve a minimum of 15 years in prison for murdering his wife , jill .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: weather : windy with a chance of rain
text: it will be a windy night with a mixture of clear spells and variable cloud , bringing a few showery spots of rain at times .
temperatures falling down to 5c ( 41f ) .
any rain is clearing on tuesday to leave a mainly dry day with sunny spells .
however , it will be a windy with gusts up to 45mph and feeling colder , with temperatures peaking at 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: teenage girl injured by car in irthlingborough
text: a 16-year-old girl fractured her collarbone after being hit by a car while crossing irthlingborough high street .
the driver of the car , which police said was silver , failed to stop at the scene and police are appealing for witnesses .
officers said it happened on 27 january between 15.15 and 15.25 .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : man questioned on sus of murder police officer given life sentence
text: if you 're catching-up :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: sculpture chosen by resident to go outside corby railway station
text: corby borough council has asked residents to choose a sculpture by artist john atkin to sit outside corby railway station .
people can find out more about the abstract sculptures made of steel and make their comments at the corby cube .
the consultation runs until saturday .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: adrian goldsmith sentencing : jill goldsmith 's son 'left disheartened '
text: during the sentencing of adrian goldsmith ( judge paul glenn said his wife and victim jill was `` a mother , a daughter and a friend of many '' .
`` no sentence the court can impose can even begin to compensate for the loss and anguish the family are feeling , '' he said .
a victim impact statement from mrs goldsmith 's son , charlie bailey , said : `` my whole family have been left disheartened by what adrian goldsmith did and the actions he took .
he has left me feeling that there is a massive part of me missing .
he should have known above everyone how to calm things down . ''
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: police seize vehicles and issue penalties during weekend 'crackdown '
text: more than 40 offences were recorded in northampton town centre on saturday in a police crackdown on the `` fatal four '' motoring incidents .
the four include not wearing a seatbelt , driving while using a mobile phone , drink driving and speeding .
here 's a breakdown of some of the offences
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: adrian goldsmith sentencing : police officer had 'been in a rage '
text: during his sentencing of northampton police officer adrian goldsmith , judge paul glenn told him he over-analysed matters , was pedantic , tactless and had been `` scathing '' of his wife .
at stafford crown court he was handed a life sentence with a minimum term of 15 years for murdering his wife , jill .
judge glenn told goldsmith what he did to his wife was `` not premeditated but spontaneous '' , with use of whatever weapons were to hand and that he had `` been in a rage '' .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: kettering student sees fox-themed design go on sale at joules
text: a student who sent her idea for a fox-inspired outfit to joules has seen it turned into a reality by the british clothing company .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: teens arrested over hotel 'arson '
text: three teenagers have been arrested on sus of arson following a fire at a hotel in corby .
more than 50 firefighters were called to the hampton by hilton in princewood road on saturday afternoon .
nobody was hurt and all 120 guests and members of staff were evacuated .
northamptonshire police said the fire was believed to have spread from an area at the back of the hotel used for rubbish and laundry .
two boys and a girl have been bailed .
author: Laura Devlin
BBC News

documents.title: sir terry wogan and the 'northampton lighthouse '
text: tributes have been pouring in for veteran bbc broadcaster sir terry wogan , who has died aged 77 .
he once dubbed the national lift tower the `` northampton lighthouse '' .
it 's a nickname that is still used by many , and in 2014 sir terry even wrote a piece on it for a book called `` icons of northamptonshire ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: grimsby sign cobblers ' horwood
text: grimsby town have signed northampton town full-back evan horwood on loan until the end of the season .
the 29-year-old has made 26 appearances for the league two side since joining permanently in 2014 , but has not played this term and is out of contract in the summer .
author: Phil Shepka
BBC Sport

documents.title: india chipchase : where was she last seen and where was the body found ?
text: india chipchase was last seen on bridge street , northampton , at 01:15 on saturday .
a body was found on sunday night in a house on stanley road in the st james area of the town .
a 51-year-old man is being questioned on sus of murder and a post mortem-examination is being carried out today .
author: Martin Barber
BBC News

documents.title: adrian goldsmith sentencing : police hope families can now 'move on '
text: the deputy chief constable of northamptonshire police says he hopes those affected by the murder of jill goldsmith will now have closure , after her husband pc adrian goldsmith was jailed for life .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: india chipchase : a 'beautiful girl ' says customer at pub where she worked
text: customers have paid tribute to a northampton pub worker thought to have been killed in the town .
india chipchase , 20 , disappeared in the early hours of saturday morning .
a man is being questioned on sus of murder after the body of a woman was found in a house on stanley road on sunday .
today , people have been laying flowers outside the collingtree pub where miss chipchase worked .
customer elly quennell told me she was a `` lovely , stunning girl '' .
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: weather : windy with showers and sunshine
text: it is cloudy across northamptonshire - including higham ferrers as you can see from this from bbc weather watcher 'ele ' .
there will be a mixture of sunshine and scattered showers this afternoon .
it 'll be very windy with a top temperature of 13c ( 55f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: rugby : saints prop kieran brookes joins england squad
text: england have added northampton 's kieran brookes to their six nations squad after the prop made a swifter than expected recovery from a knee injury .
brookes , originally in the squad before having to undergo surgery in december , proved his fitness in friday 's premiership match against wasps .
he will replace henry thomas who had been an injury replacement for brookes .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: india chipcase : pub book of remembrance for 'shining star '
text: floral tributes continue to arrive for india chipcase at the collingtree pub where she worked , who said miss chipchase was a `` shining star '' .
the pub has now made a special area for flowers and opened a book of remembrance for the community to pay their respects .
a man has been arrested on sus of murder after police searching for miss chipcase found a body in a house .
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: supporter trust to discuss suggestions for their 'fighting fund '
text: the northampton town supporters trust has ended their consultation on how their £ 37,000 'fighting fund ' for the club should be spent .

the money was raised when the club was in a precarious financial position , before the kelvin thomas takeover with about £ 10,000 used before the takeover as a loan to the club to support non-playing staff .
the trust will discuss the ideas submitted during the consultation at their next board meeting on 11 february .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : adrian goldsmith sentenced to life cobblers loan money 'misappropriated ' claims court papers
text: headlines : adrian goldsmith sentenced to life cobblers loan money 'misappropriated ' claims court papers
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: india chipchase : flowers laid at the collingtree pub
text: people have been laying floral tributes to india chipchase outside the pub in collingtree where she worked .
formal identification has yet to take place , but her family have been informed of the discovery of the body at a property in the st james area of the town .
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: adrian goldsmith sentencing : murdered wife 'in terror ' as she fought for life
text: continuing the sentencing of northamptonshire police officer adrian 'otis ' goldsmith , judge paul glenn said his wife `` must have been in terror as she fought for her life , as i am satisfied she did '' .
he murdered 49-year-old jill goldsmith at their home in northampton last march .
she was found dead in a foetal position in a pool of blood in their porch .
a stafford crown court jury dismissed his claim that he acted in self-defence after he admitted in court that he stabbed himself .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: adrian goldsmith sentencing : judge says murdered wife 'suffered physically before she died '
text: a northamptonshire police officer who murdered his wife and claimed to colleagues he 'd killed her in self defence has been jailed for life .
adrian 'otis ' goldsmith was told the starting point of his sentence would be 15 years .
judge paul glenn at stafford crown court told him : `` the nature of this attack was such that your victim would inevitably have suffered physically before she died .
there were multiple blows , predominantly to the head . ''
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: breakingadrian goldsmith sentenced to life with minimum term of 15 years
text: adrian 'otis ' goldsmith , the northampton police officer found guilty of killing his wife jill , has been sentenced to life in prison with a minimum term of 15 years .
the 50-year-old was found guilty of beating his wife to death using a can of paint , a battery and a mallet by a jury at stafford crown court on friday .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: india chipchase : 'extremely popular ' says college principal
text: northampton college , where india chipchase studied health and social care , said it is `` devastated '' after hearing a body has been found .
principal pat brennan-barrett said the 20-year-old was `` extremely popular '' and `` hard-working '' during her time at the college .
formal identification of the body discovered by police at stanley road in northampton has yet to take place .
we are devastated to hear of the death of our former student @ twitterid a terrible loss .
# ripindia
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: india chipchase : 'beautiful sister '
text: the sister of india chipchase , pia , posted on the northampton chronicle & echo facebook page describing the 20-year-old as her `` beautiful sister '' , adding she would make her `` proud '' .
a man has been arrested on sus of murder after police searching for miss chipchase , who was missing since the early hours of saturday , found a body in a house on stanley road .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : cobblers loan negotiations 'led ' by businessman court papers claim man in northampton arrested on sus of murder
text: here 's what we are looking into this morning :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: legion d'honneur to be given to oundle world war two veteran
text: war veteran tony haywood , from oundle , will be presented with the legion d'honneur on behalf of the president of france this afternoon .
tony , who celebrated his 91st birthday at the weekend , took part in the final push against the nazis following the d-day landings .
the ceremony in oundle will be presided over by the lord lieutenant for northamptonshire , david laing .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: india chipchase : work colleagues call her a 'little smile machine '
text: the pub where india chipchase worked said `` hearts are broken '' , after hearing the news a body has been found .
the collingtree pub on butts road in northampton posted a tribute on facebook , calling miss chipcase a `` little smile machine '' who `` bought joy to so many '' .
it added : `` your infectious smile and humour will be sorely missed . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: charley hull struggles as kim hyo-joo wins lpga event in bahamas
text: a final round of 71 ended charley hull 's hopes of victory at the pure silk classic in the bahamas .
hull , 19 , from burton latimer , had a share of the lead going into the final round but struggled with two bogeys to finish on 14 under par .
it left her four shots behind the winner , south korea 's kim hyo-joo , who had a superb seven-under final round of 66 for a two-shot victory .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: adrian goldsmith due to be sentenced today
text: northampton police officer adrian goldsmith ( left ) was found guilty on friday of murdering his wife jill ( right ) , 49 , at the couple 's home in wootton .
he is due to be sentenced today at stafford crown court , where the minimum term before he can be considered for release will be set .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC Look East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: ​person threatens to jump off a45 bridge in northants - days after similar incident on same road
text: a woman threatened to jump off a bridge on the a45 in northants - just days after a similar incident on the same dual carriageway .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: family and friends of india chipchase pay tribute as police question murder suspect
text: family and friends of 20-year-old india chipchase paid tribute to her last night after police confirmed the discovery of a body at a house in northampton .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: india chipchase : brother 's tribute to 'best big sister '
text: the brother of a woman who went missing on saturday has posted a tribute to her on social media .
police searching for india chipchase , 20 , found a body in stanley road , st james , yesterday .
formal identification has yet to take place .
harry chipchase posted on twitter : `` you 'll always remain the best big sister i ever had and always hold a place deep in my heart . ''
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: weather : sharp showers and sunny spells
text: it will be a cloudy morning with some outbreaks of light rain and drizzle .
towards lunchtime brighter spells will develop to give a mixture of sunshine and scattered showers this afternoon .
top temperature of 13c ( 55f ) .
you can see my full forecast below
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: disruption on trains from northampton and long buckby to london
text: following a landslip between milton keynes and watford junction over the weekend , some london-bound lines are blocked .
it means there may be delays on trains from long buckby and northampton to london and some services may call at additional stations .
as yet we do n't know when the line will return to normal .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: headlines : arrest for murder in northampton cobblers loan money 'misappropriated ' claims court papers
text: if you are just joining us , here are top stories in northamptonshire this morning :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: india chipchase search : a timeline of events
text: here are some key times in the search for missing india chipchase .

documents.title: india chipchase last seen in bridge street
text: india chipchase had been on a night out with friends before she went missing in the early hours of saturday morning .
the 20-year-old was last seen in bridge street , northampton , at about 01:15 .
police said ms chipchase was white , about 5ft 3in tall and of a `` slim build '' .
she was wearing black jeans , a long sleeved green crop top and black gilet when she was last seen .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: police appeal for missing india chipchase after work absence
text: police appealed for information about india chipchase 36 hours after she went missing during a night out in northampton .

at 12:52 yesterday police said it was `` out of character '' for ms chipchase not to have made contact with friends and family , and `` out of the ordinary '' for her not to arrive at work on saturday afternoon .
a press release sent nine hours later said officers searching for ms chipchase had found a body in stanley road , st james .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: developer 's company 'led cobblers loan negotiations with council '
text: northampton town football club gave a company owned by the developer in charge of the redevelopment of sixfields responsibility to lead negotiations with northampton borough council over a £ 10.25m loan , according to a document lodged with the high court .

it describes how howard grossman , marcus grossman and simon patnick , who all worked for county group , arranged for monies to be paid by nbc to the county group via ntfc at a time when such monies were not contractually due to county group '' .
mr patnick , marcus grossman and mr hewitt also received £ 1.09m in consultancy payments '' .
through their solicitor they said the payments were for `` legitimate services to the company as consultants '' .
author: Matt Precey
BBC Look East

documents.title: police at scene of northampton body find
text: it was just after 22:00 last night that northamptonshire police announced a body had been found by officers searching for missing 20-year-old india chipchase .
here is the scene this morning at stanley road , st james , where the body was found .
a post-mortem examination is due to take place later today .
author: Chaz Harrison
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: cobblers developer rejects 'dishonest ' claim
text: developer howard grossman has rejected a claim of dishonest association '' made in high court papers in relation to the £ 10.25m loan from northampton borough council to northampton town fc .

in a witness statement , mr grossman said the allegations of wrongdoing in the papers lodged by the cobblers , who were trying to establish what had happened to the loan money and to try to recover it , were outrageous and deeply offensive '' .
the claim was settled out of court and the parties signed a non-disclosure agreement .
author: Matt Precey
BBC Look East

documents.title: india chipchase murder probe : first photograph from the scene
text: i 've come to stanley road in northampton , where a police cordon is in place after a woman 's body was found .
india chipchase , 20 , disappeared in the early hours of saturday after a night out with friends .
a 51-year-old man has been arrested on sus of murder and remains in police custody .
author: Chaz Harrison
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton town 's £ 10.25m loan : where the money went
text: a bbc investigation into northampton borough council 's £ 10.25m loan to northampton town has detailed where the money went - with £ 8.75m being transferred by the club to developer 1st land ltd and county ( oundle ) ltd , both owned by howard grossman .
of this money :
author: Matt Precey
BBC Look East

documents.title: cobblers loan 'misappropriated by developers '
text: millions of pounds of taxpayers ' money that was meant to be spent on the redevelopment of sixfields was misappropriated '' by developers , according to claims made in documents seen by the bbc .
northampton borough council lent northampton town £ 10.25m for work including a new stand , hotel and conference centre , none of which has been completed .
documents submitted to the high court contain allegations developer howard grossman and his associates , who deny the claim , used a substantial part '' of the money for unrelated purposes .
author: Matt Precey
BBC Look East

documents.title: man , 51 , arrested after body found in house
text: a 51-year-old man has been arrested on sus of murder after police searching for a missing woman found a body at a house in northampton .
india chipchase , 20 , went missing in the early hours of saturday after a night out with friends in the town .
formal identification of the body , which was found at a property in stanley road , st james , has yet to take place but ms chipchase 's family have been informed about the discovery .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: woman 's body found in northampton house
text: police searching for a missing woman have found a body at a house in northampton .
india chipchase , 20 , disappeared in the early hours of saturday after a night out with friends in the town .
formal identification has yet to take place but her family have been informed of the discovery of the body , at a property in stanley road , st james .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: welcome to monday 's local live
text: good morning and welcome to monday 's local live .
we 're starting early today to bring you the latest on two big stories that are breaking :
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News
